content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: purpur_block
inventory=[{"type": "salmon_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "chorus_fruit", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "compass", "quantity": 45, "index": 13}, {"type": "sea_pickle", "quantity": 59, "index": 16}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 34, "index": 35}]
thought: To craft a purpur_block, I first need to craft 4 popped_chorus_fruit. I will smelt the chorus_fruit from slot 12 into the empty slot 14.
Ok
act: smelt from slot 12 to slot 14 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: purpur_block
inventory=[{"type": "salmon_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "chorus_fruit", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "compass", "quantity": 45, "index": 13}, {"type": "popped_chorus_fruit", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "sea_pickle", "quantity": 59, "index": 16}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 34, "index": 35}]
thought: I will smelt the next chorus_fruit into the empty slot 15.
Ok
act: smelt from slot 12 to slot 15 with quantity 1

thought: Now that I have 4 popped_chorus_fruit, I can craft the purpur_block. I will first move the popped_chorus_fruit from slot 14 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: Now I can craft the purpur_block by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4
